name: END OF TRANSMISSION
description:
The Earth has fallen silent.

An ancient extra-terrestrial race returns to the lifeless planet, raising ancient columns from the ground, reserved there a millennia before. Deflect and merge the crystal beacons to configure the timeworn technology, and reclaim the final recorded data of the human race.

A Game By Memes Killed Us:

Sam Beale - Puzzle Design and Production
Birdie Davison - 2D Assets
Lauren Filby - Programmer
Mildrid ‘Mille’ Johnsen - 3D Assets
Gary Kings - Narrative and Production
Anne-Sophie Ouvrier - Sound and Music

And Also:
Joshua Thurston - Test Boy
